website_summaries.verdict: A neutral lip crayon that enhances your natural look. Clean ingredients like orange wax and resveratrol keep this matte formula from drying our lips.
pros: Provides rich, long-lasting color without drying
Orange peel wax locks in moisture so strongly that you can feel it
A neutral tone that helps your lips look natural, only better
cons: Some customers felt it should last longer for the price

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear lipstick often but when I do this is a great one. It's matte finish so I do put gloss over it when I first put it on. When the gloss wears off, the color stays until I wipe my mouth from eating. I do not find that it wears off in the middle of the lips leaving me with what looks like bad lip liner. It's really great and I always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Debnbri

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: This color lipstick was perfect for me and it seems like it will last a while. I have never paid this much for lipstick, but a friend recommended the brand to me. I have fair skin and bought the color, glace. I will buy bite lipstick again - in the regular size, like this purchase. Don't waste your money on the "mini" sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JoyR

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lip coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love the matt coverage without drying out your lips. I was introduced to it as part of a birthday gift from Sophora and was WOWed- it's also a great color for all skin types! I
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulty finding matte lipsticks with staying power that don't dry my lips. This is the one! The color is rich and beautiful, it stays on all day - even after lunch - and my lips don't feel cracked and dry. I will wear this every day!
customer_reviews.author: M. Joann Wright

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff!!!🤬
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a knockoff then buy from this seller. Total fake. The product and packaging are a lame attempt to pass off as an older version of Bite products. The color definitely is off- more peachy. Do yourself a favor go to the official bite website, spend the exact amount of money an get the real thing. That’s what I should have done in the first place(for some reason- dint think of this). Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it’s expensive for the size you get but it’s a quality lipstick. The color is exactly as it appears.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie (California)

customer_reviews.title: It has came out straight without defect
customer_reviews.text: It came broken 😞 I’m sad, but really like this color and lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match online search.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a nude color. It is an almost iridescent pink. It looks nothing like the picture. Wish I could return. Perhaps the factory out the wrong label on the product. Do not buy unless you want bubblegum pink lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Saltonstall

customer_reviews.title: Not drying
customer_reviews.text: This is great, stays on, not drying. Do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Humphrey-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color so much. Use as all over lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of application, the color & staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F., CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and although the packaging was slightly dented the lip crayon itself is in perfect condition. I adore this shade, will definitely repurchase. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip product of all time!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lip color of all time!!! This is a great neutral that everyone should try! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just really like this product. I use it to define my lips and it helps other lip gloss or lipstick last longer when I layer! It goes in smoothly and is not drying!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid C. Meizner

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Favorite color it does not dry my lips! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C.

customer_reviews.title: It would be the perfect product if it would last for longer while applied.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Nice color and very creamy!! I would love it if it had a better longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Liza lopez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip color on me but wish there were more product for the price. Good lipstick other than that.
customer_reviews.author: derek B.

customer_reviews.title: BITE Beauty knows lips 👄
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried their lip products was as a Sephora birthday gift, and I’m so glad. I made those deluxe minis last as long as I could. All of BITE’s lipsticks are moisturizing, long-wearing, and smell great. Beautiful pigment... and this one is a staple neutral. I’m forever in search of that “my lips, but better” lipstick, and this is one of my faves. Apply lightly for a natural lip, or apply normally for a saturated and pillowy pout.
customer_reviews.author: webhead770

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shade
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shade. It goes with everything, dresses up or down, and looks good on everyone. Have repurchased many many times. I only wish it would last a little bit longer as I find myself reapplying more often than I would like to, but otherwise you can't beat the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: heykerriannn

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, and the color is beautiful. Love the slim profile for my clutch purses.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Easy apply, long lasting lip color.
customer_reviews.text: Addicted to this lip color pencil. Nice base for lipstick or gloss. Or I often wear it alone. Long lasting!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Said I was ordering glacé yet rose glacé was delivered. The rose version is a frosty pink, which I don’t recommend. Not sure if I can return since I didn’t pay attn and tossed box.
customer_reviews.author: Too Much Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and very good quality. It runs out fast though.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the feel of it on my lips. I am disappointed that it only lasts for about 15 to 20 uses. It runs out in 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Gets soft and gets wasted easily.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and feel but doesn't last very long especially for a $20 lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They're so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're so comfortable, have such nice pigmentation, and smell nice. They aren't extremely long-lasting but I don't care because I enjoy them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

product_meta.title: Bite Beauty Matte Crème Cream Lip Crayon Pencil, Glace
product_meta.description: Color:GlaceWhat it is: A high-pigment lip crayon with long-wearing, water-resistant color and a matte finish that feels hydrating. What it does: This long-wearing lip crayon delivers rich, high-pigment color that lasts. It’s made with orange peel wax, which seals in hydration for a water-resistant, matte finish that feels moist. Lips look more supple and smooth, and feel nourished and protected. Matte Crème Lip Crayon is handcrafted by Bite Beauty at the brand’s facility in Toronto, and is made with natural ingredients, such as resveratrol, an antioxidant found in red wine. Experience matte color that satisfies with each and every swipe—all day long. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates Beauty tip: Layer Matte Crème Lip Crayon over Bite Beauty's Agave Lip Balm (sold separately) for added hydration.
